duties_responsibilities.duty: Own strategic planning and campaign execution for assigned clients.
Generate strategic insights for campaigns and implement campaigns with the support of Programmatic Analysts.
Train Programmatic Analysts on client specific requirements and provide expertise in optimization strategies.
Proactively identify opportunities to test partners and create custom solutions for inventory and new channel strategies.
Work with offshore management on feedback and needs, maintain process docs, training, and new hire onboarding material.

education_certification.credential: 1-2 years of experience in RTB, DSPs, ad exchanges, ad servers, verification partners, and other supply platforms.
Deep understanding of programmatic planning, buying, and ad tech vendors.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office solutions, specifically Excel.
Strong desire to contribute to a team.
